author: Judith Prakash J
casename: Teck Jin (Pte) Ltd v Tan Kim Seng
counsel: Tan Kay Kheng and Melvin See (WongPartnership) for the plaintiff; Vincent Yeoh (Vincent Yeoh & Co) for the defendant
tags-parsed: Companies/Shares/Shares held on Trust/Plaintiff sought declaration defendant was trustee for plaintiff of shares in different companies/Whether defendant held shares on trust for plaintiff/Whether plaintiff agreed to pay premium and administrative fee/Whether there was comprehensive final settlement/Whether plaintiff decided to forego rights issues
